document_data.name: ''Blades and Bardings''
document_data.History: ''Blades and Bardings'', its sheet music, and lyrics, all were recored in the [[book]] simply titled ''[[Sword Coast Songbook]]'', compiled by [[Silke Rosena]]. The book was made available for purchase in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in or before the late 15{{th}} century DR.
